generated_description: rivermead holidays is a holiday park located in st breward on bodmin moor, cornwall. the park offers a variety of holiday accommodations, including 1-bedroom and 2-bedroom caravans, as well as a chalet with a double bedroom, day bed, and trundle. each unit features amenities such as a flat-screen tv, dvd player, cooker, microwave, fridge, shower, and toilet facilities. the park also provides garden furniture and laundry facilities. guests can enjoy the natural beauty of bodmin moor and nearby coasts, and the park is centrally located to explore both the north and south coasts.
